item.title: Contributing
item.description: Contributing to the Adie Hub Check out the repo on github. We are using Hugo to build the site. This means all of the content lives in simple markdown files under the content/post folder! If you just want to correct a typo or add something small to an already existing page, you can skip steps 1, 3, and 4. If you want to add a new page, please follow the steps below:
